item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, December 30, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Tell HN: John Friel my father, internet pioneer and creator of QModem, has died (219 points | 21 comments)
2. Execution Units Are Often Pipelined (101 points | 35 comments)
3. Curl-Impersonate (294 points | 64 comments)
4. Beyond BLE: Cracking Open the Black-Box of RF Microcontrollers [video] (67 points | 8 comments)
5. Fun facts about SQLite (137 points | 60 comments)
6. A simple way to explore data through a Tableau-like UI directly in your data app (53 points | 3 comments)
7. MiceWine – run Windows applications and games on Android smartphones (131 points | 39 comments)
8. From Pegasus to Predator – The evolution of commercial spyware on iOS [video] (342 points | 121 comments)
9. Ts_zip: Text Compression Using Large Language Models (43 points | 8 comments)
10. Short Message Compression Using LLMs (92 points | 48 comments)
11. 'Obelisks': New Class of Life Has Been Found in Human Digestive System (157 points | 53 comments)
12. YouTuber won DMCA fight with fake Nintendo lawyer by detecting spoofed email (111 points | 52 comments)
13. FTC orders 'gun detection' tech maker Evolv to stop overstating effectiveness (101 points | 88 comments)
14. Empirical Study of Test Generation with LLM's (17 points | 4 comments)
15. Bench to be acquired after abruptly shutting down (70 points | 49 comments)
16. Pincites (YC S23) is hiring a founding engineer to build legal AI agents (Remote) ( | hide)
17. QR-style codes could replace barcodes 'within two years' (12 points | 12 comments)
18. Show HN: I built open source file sharing solution using AWS S3 (28 points | 16 comments)
19. AI companies cause most of traffic on forums (313 points | 211 comments)
20. Learning Solver Design: Automating Factorio Balancers (6 points | discuss)
21. Passkey technology is elegant, but it's most definitely not usable security (207 points | 229 comments)
22. Limits to Growth (1972) (79 points | 53 comments)
23. KAG – Knowledge Graph RAG Framework (195 points | 63 comments)
24. Pigment Mixing into Digital Painting (346 points | 52 comments)
25. Nikon reveals a lens that captures wide and telephoto images simultaneously (154 points | 87 comments)
26. The Cody Computer (220 points | 28 comments)
27. 86Box: Emulator of x86-Based Machines (75 points | 25 comments)
28. PolyDye: Full color printer mod for Marlin 3D printers (112 points | 29 comments)
29. Wishing Everyone a Happy Solsthelion (51 points | 30 comments)
30. The Zombocom Problem (243 points | 70 comments)
